References

It's very easy to get lost on the middle of the PLS universe. Here we provide a number of references that may be useful for PLS users and newbies.

Some References related to PLS:

  • the History section contains a list references with material related to the history of PLS methods.

  • the Books section contains a list of some books about PLS

  • the Path Modeling section contains some of the main references about PLS Path Modeling

  • the Regression section contains some of the main references about PLS Regression

  • the Dissertations section contains several PhD Theses written about PLS and related methods
